member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.SignedInGamerExtensions
member.summary: Extensions to SignedInGamer that add Profile Data storage.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.SignedInGamerExtensions.BeginAwardAvatarAssets(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.SignedInGamer,System.String[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins the async process of awarding the specified avatar assets to a locally signed in gamer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.SignedInGamerExtensions.EndAwardAvatarAssets(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.SignedInGamer,System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: This function should be called when the system has finished awarding the avatar asset, and is used to ensure that the process finished successfully.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.SignedInGamerExtensions.AwardAvatarAssets(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.SignedInGamer,System.String[])
member.summary: Awards an Avatar Assets. This is a blocking call: to query asynchronously, use Begin/EndAwardAvatarAssets instead.
